title: Game Character Sci-fi Robot Voice Sound Effects
description: Activate a robotic artificial life form in your next audio production with AAA Game Character Sci-fi Robot, a unique collection of futuristic cyborg styled voice over sound files created for sci-fi games & trailers.
longDescription:
Audio Demos

This voice-over library features a male protagonist game character inspired by FPS & RPG games.

Beep Boo Boo Bop! Activate a robotic artificial life form in your next audio production with Game Character Sci-fi Robot, a unique collection of futuristic cyborg styled voice-over sound files created for sci-fi games and movie/game trailers. This voice-over library features a male protagonist character inspired by FPS and RPG games.

Game Character Sci-fi Robot voice-over sound library provides you with 340+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, battle cries, custom dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes and outstanding gameplay audio experiences. The robot’s voice texture is dry, and slightly pitch shifted. He is perfect for an assistant, side-kick, NPC, or any helpful game characters needed. Sound files are ready to go out of the box, and they are clean enough for further audio processing if needed.

All of the recordings are delivered in44.1khz/16bit .wav file format, giving you the best quality for heavy sound editing, pitch shifting and FX processing while keeping a top notch level of clarity and precision.
technicalDetails:
Product Details:

  • 346 sci-fi robot voice-over audio files
  • 189 MB of voice samples
  • All in 44.1k/16bit .WAV file format
  • Game character voice-over sound effects library
  • Perfect for space, sci-fi & fantasy games, film and movie trailers
  • 10 battle cries
  • 6 breathing files
  • 5 coughing recordings
  • 15 sad crying sounds
  • 130 immersive character specific dialogue lines - like, “activate forcefield, silly humans, my hard drive is full” - see content list for full details
  • 25 fight vocals
  • 26 jumping vocalizations
  • 6 laughing sounds
  • 23 pain vocals
  • 100 stock dialogue lines - like, “hello, farewell, alright” - see content list for more
  • All royalty free
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)


Number of Audio Waves: 346

Number of Audio Cues: 346

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k/16bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 14m

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
